content:
# We encountered an error indicating that there is no iron ore available in our inventory to insert into the furnaces. 
# This suggests that the previous attempt to harvest iron ore was not successful or the iron ore was not properly retained.

# Let's check our current inventory to confirm the absence of iron ore.
print(f"Current inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the current inventory status.

# If we have no iron ore, we will need to go back to the iron ore patch to harvest more before we can continue smelting. 
# If there is iron ore in the inventory, we will need to investigate why the insertion failed.
